name: Belters - Search and Rescue
description:
Rescue all the Belters before the Solar Storm Front Hits!

Belters - Search and Rescue

  • Basic controls: WASD ↑ ← ↓ → and Space
  • See in-game instructions for more details

Classic

  • Basic controls: WAD ↑ ← → and Space

Combines elements of Asteroids, Fortnite and AdVenture Capitalist

Entry for the 2021 Epic MegaJam
